abstract: Supercell reports that it tripled sales and doubled core profit in 2014 due to its hit video game titles Clash of Clans, Hay Day and Boom Beach; company reports operating profit of 515 million euros, or $564 million, up from 243 million euros in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The Finnish mobile-game maker Supercell said it tripled sales and doubled core profit last year on the back of its hit titles Clash of Clans, Hay Day and Boom Beach.

headline.main: Finnish Game Maker Supercell Tripled Its Revenue Last Year
headline.print_headline: Finnish Game Maker Supercell Tripled Its Revenue Last Year

snippet: The Finnish mobile-game maker Supercell said it tripled sales and doubled core profit last year on the back of its hit titles Clash of Clans, Hay Day and Boom Beach.
